channel.title: Game Initialization :: K-State CIS 580 Textbook
channel.description: Before we actually move into the game loop, we need to initialize the game - load all of its needed parts and set all initial values. The MonoGame Game class provides two virtual hook methods for doing this: Game.Initialize() and Game.LoadContent().
